Scarlet.name: Scarlet
Scarlet.description:
<c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c>
Your other pilot.
His cards confer <c=keyword>unconventional movement</c> with an effective mix of <c=keyword>offensive</c> and <c=keyword>defensive</c> options.

ElectrolyteSurge.name: ELECTROLYTE SURGE
ElectrolyteSurge.description:
Every two times your discard pile is shuffled back into your draw pile, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.
<c=downside>Caps at 1 per turn.</c>

TrickAction.name: TRICK ACTION
TrickAction.description: If you end your turn with more than 0 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, gain 1 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c> and 1 <c=status>FADE</c>.

CardEngine.name: CARD ENGINE
CardEngine.description:
Draw an additional card after the first turn.
Every <c=keyword>15th</c> time you draw a card, draw an additional card.

ReactionWheel.name: REACTION WHEEL
ReactionWheel.description:
Every <c=keyword>10th</c> time you draw a card, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.
<c=downside>Caps at 2 per turn.</c>

CloakAndDagger.name: CLOAK AND DAGGER
CloakAndDagger.description: At start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>FADE</c>. Once per turn, your next attack use 1 <c=status>FADE</c>, becoming <c=cardTraits>piercing</c> and dealing <c=keyword>1</c> additional damage.

HardlightAfterburners.name: HARDLIGHT AFTERBURNERS
HardlightAfterburners.description: At the start of combat, every two turns, gain 1 <c=status>HERMES</c>.

Twinsticks.name: TWINSTICKS
Twinsticks.description: At start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>. Every other turn, gain 1 <c=status>FADE</c>.

EngagementRings.name: ENGAGEMENT RINGS
EngagementRings.description: At start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>RAGE</c>. Every other turn, gain 1 <c=status>SATURATION BARRAGE</c>.

VanguardBerthing.name: VANGUARD BERTHING
VanguardBerthing.description: Start with <c=keyword>1</c> additional crew member, chosen from 3 <c=downside>random</c> options. At start of turn, draw 1 additional card.
VanguardBerthing.descExtra1: <c=white>BERTHING</c>: Draw <c=keyword>{{TTberthingCardDraw}}</c> additional cards at start of turn.
VanguardBerthing.descExtra2: <c=white>BERTHING+</c>: Gain <c=keyword>{{TTberthingEnergyFragment}}</c> <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c> at start of turn.

VanguardBerthingInitial.name: VANGUARD BERTHING
VanguardBerthingInitial.description:
(Vanguard-exclusive artifact!)
Choose <c=keyword>1</c> additional crew member, their cards are <c=keyword>upgraded randomly</c> and pick <c=keyword>1</c> uncommon card from their deck to add.
At start of turn, draw 1 additional card.

VanguardBerthingPlus.name: VANGUARD BERTHING+
VanguardBerthingPlus.description:
(Vanguard-exclusive artifact!)
Choose <c=keyword>1</c> additional crew member, their cards are <c=keyword>upgraded randomly</c> and pick <c=keyword>2</c> uncommon cards and  <c=keyword>1</c> rare card from their deck to add.
At start of turn, draw 1 additional card and gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c>.

VanguardBerthingChoice.title: VANGUARD BERTHING
VanguardBerthingChoice.choice: Choose a crew member to add!

TwoPilots.name: TWO PILOTS
TwoPilots.description:
At the start of combat, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>, 1 <c=status>FADE</c>, draw an additional card and 1 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c>.
Love motivates you to do your best.
Let's get out of this mess.
Together.

Vanguard.name: Vanguard
Vanguard.description: The T2XS Vanguard! <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c>'s starship from <c=white>Silversoul Productions</c> with more protection and space for additional crew.

VanguardBoss.name: Vanguard?
VanguardBoss.description:
Who needs crew?
<c=downside>Too powerful for it's own good. If you're using this ship, you already lost. (from shame)</c>

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.description:
X = your <c=status>FADE</c>.
Attack. Dmg = <c=damage>1</c> + X (<c=damage>{{Damage}}</c>) <c=cardtrait>pierce, stun.</c>
<c=status>FADE</c> = 0.
Backstab.descA:
X = your <c=status>FADE</c>.
Attack. Dmg = <c=damage>1</c> + X (<c=damage>{{Damage}}</c>) <c=cardtrait>pierce, stun.</c>
<c=status>FADE</c> = 0.

ScarletEXE.name: Scarlet.EXE
ScarletEXE.description: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c> cards to your hand.
ScarletEXE.descA: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c> cards to your hand.
ScarletEXE.descB: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c> cards to your hand.

Fade.name: Fade
Fade.description:
Prevent next direct hit, missile hit, card and status intents on this ship.
<c=downside>Goes away at start of next turn.</c>

scarletBarrage.name: Saturation Barrage
scarletBarrage.description: <c=downside>Inaccurately</c> fire {0} times for <c=keyword>0</c> damage immediately after every attack or move you make that applies <c=keyword>1</c> <c=status>SATURATION</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at start of next turn.</c>

Saturation.name: Saturation
Saturation.description: When this ship reaches <c=keyword>2</c> Saturation, it takes <c=damage>1</c> damage!

TrickDagger_Missile.name: TRICK DAGGER
TrickDagger_Missile.description:
This dagger is going to deal <c=damage>1</c> damage.
Ignores all shields and armor.
<c=keyword>Shooting</c> this dagger randomly moves it 1 space and increase its damage by 1.

SangeDagger_Missile.name: SANGE DAGGER
SangeDagger_Missile.description:
This dagger is going to deal <c=damage>1</c> damage.
Ignores all shields and armor.
<c=keyword>Shooting</c> this dagger randomly moves it 1 space and increase its damage by 1.
<c=downside>It cannot miss!</c>

YashaDagger_Missile.name: YASHA DAGGER
YashaDagger_Missile.description:
This dagger is going to deal <c=damage>1</c> damage.
Ignores all shields and armor.
<c=keyword>Shooting</c> this dagger randomly moves it 1 space and increase its damage by 2.
